text: Henry "Harry" Clifton (28 May 1914 – 1998) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1998 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Annfield Plain F.C. players Category:Scotswood F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:Ashfield United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Harry Clifton (footballer, born 1914)
